properties.name: info.app.version
properties.description: Application name to be shown on the banner

properties.name: app.migration.extractor.name
properties.description: Implementation of data extractor from source database

properties.name: app.migration.extractor.csvSeparator
properties.description: Data Extractor field separator for CSV content

properties.name: app.migration.transporter.name
properties.description: Implementation of data transport from source o target database

properties.name: app.migration.loader.name
properties.description: Implementation of data loader to target database

properties.name: app.migration.loader.csvSeparator
properties.description: Data Loader field separator for CSV content

properties.name: app.migration.observer.name
properties.description: Implementation of migration observer to provide user feedback of the internal process

properties.name: app.persistence.transporter.fileSystem.temporal-path
properties.description: A local path for temporal files created during migration using filesystem transporter

properties.name: app.migration.service.schedule
properties.description: When using service mode, this is a CRON expression for scheduling the migration task execution

properties.name: app.migration.service.timezone
properties.description: When using service mode, this is the timezone for the CRON expression

properties.name: app.migration.service.projectPath
properties.description: When using service mode, this is the AWS SCT Project Path for the migration

properties.name: app.migration.service.sourcePassword
properties.description: When using service mode, this is the password for the source Datasource

properties.name: app.migration.service.targetPassword
properties.description: When using service mode, this is the password for the target Datasource
